DOC.brief_summary: Many drugs used for the treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus cause the body to retain water. This study will assess whether or not GW677954 causes the body to retain fluid.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess GW677954 Used In Combination With Insulin In Subjects Who Have Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Have been diagnosed by a doctor with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus at least 3 months before Screening Have a body mass index within range 25 to 40.0kg/m2 inclusive Females who meet above criteria must be physiologically incapable of becoming pregnant (ie., surgically sterilized, or postmenopausal per protocol definition) Exclusion criteria: Significant weight loss or gain in the 3 months before screening Have used insulin to treat hyperglycemia within 3 months before screening Have a history of fluid retention Have uncontrolled high blood pressure Have liver disease Take loop diuretics (water pills), certain blood thinners, and/or St. Johns Wort. Have or have had certain kinds of cancer
